    • Uses of TableTransformation in ca.uqac.lif.labpal.table

      Classes in ca.uqac.lif.labpal.table that implement TableTransformation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Composition
      A table transformation made by chaining multiple transformations one after the other.
      class  ExpandAsColumns
      Transforms a table by expanding the values of one column as column headers.
      class  NormalizeColumns
      Replaces the content of each entry by its fraction of the sum of all values for the column
      class  NormalizeRows
      Replaces the content of each entry by its fraction of the sum of all values for the row
      class  RelativizeRows
      Replaces each value of the input table by the ratio of this value to the smallest value in the row
